name: Johnny Went Down to Hell
description:
The Devil Went Down to Georgia and got into a fiddle battle with a boy named Johnny. Johnny won the duel, but the Devil wasn't satisfied. Now, Johnny must battle his way through Hell's forces and defeat each of the Devil's Demon band members in musical combat in order to claim his prize of the Golden Fiddle. 

Credits: 

Original Art - Wesley McDowell 

Programmers - Keith Morel, Wesley McDowell 

Backgrounds - unknown, from Google Images 

Music and Sounds - Tanner Helland 

"The Devil Went to Georgia" - Charlie Daniels Band
